ABC analysis classifies the materials based on their consumption during a particular time period (usually YoY, five years and ten years etc).

patterns: Could you brief me about ABC Analysis
Please tell me about ABC Analysis
Please share me about ABC Analysis
responses: Identifies the objective and the analysis criterion.Collect all the data about the inventory and calculate the consumption pr sale value.Arrange all the consumption values in the descending order.Create next column and start adding the cumulative total of consumption value.Assign the category based on the accumulated values as A,B and C

FMS Analysis is based on the rate of issue or rate of usage of spare parts. This classification system categorizes the items based on how frequently the parts are issued and how frequently they are used.

patterns: Please tell me about FMS Analysis
Please share me about FMS Analysis
responses: Classification is based on the patterns of issues from stores and is useful in controlling obsolescence.Date of issue,whichever is later,is taken to determine the number of months which have lapsed since the last transaction.Based on number of months categorize as F.M and S

VED analysis classifies the materials according to their criticality and impact to the production process or other services i.e. how and to what extent the material M1 is going to effect the production if the material M1 is not available.

patterns: Could you brief me about VED Analysis
Please tell me about VED Analysis
Please share me about VED Analysis
responses: Identification of factors essential for VED Analysis.Calculate the sum of actual working hours.Finding out how many times the order was placed.Calculate the average working hours.Place the items into V,E and D categories.
XYZ analysis classifies the materials based on stock value accumulation. It is calculated by dividing an item's current stock value by the total stock value of the stores.

patterns: Please tell me about XYZ Analysis
please share me about XYZ analysis
responses: Identify the objective and the analysis criterion.Collect all the data about the inventory.Divide item's current stock value(cost per piece)with the total stock value(total cost).Arrange all the consumption values in descending order of values.Create next column and start adding the cumulative total of consumption value.Assign the category based on the accumulatedn value as X,Y and Z.
HML analysis classifies the materials based on their unit prices. The main objective of this analysis is to minimize the inventory cost such as labor cost, material cost etc.

patterns: Please tell me about hml analysis
could you please brief me about hml analysis
please share me about hml analysis
responses: Prepare the list of item,s and calculate their unit cost,annual demand and annual usage.Arrange items in the descending order of their unit cost.Calculate percentage of unit cost.The cut-off lines are then fixed by the organization for deciding three categories.Plot the graph on the basis of cumulative unit cost and then categories the inventory items
SDE analysis classifies inventory based on how freely available an item or scarce an item is, or the length of its lead time.

patterns: please share me about sde description
could you please share me about hml description
responses: Identify the objective and the analysis criterion.Collect all the data about the scarcity and availability of the items.Identify the lead time in week/days.Arrange the values in the descending order.Assign the category based on the lead time as S,D and E
The International Standard Industrial classification of All Economic Activities is a United Nations industry classification system

patterns: Please tell me about ISIC allocation
responses: International Standard Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities(ISIC) consists of a coherenr and consistent classification structure of economic activities based on a set of internationally agreed concepts,definitions,principles and classification rules.It provides a comprehensive framework within which economic data can be collected and reported in a format that is designed for purposes of economic analysis,decision-taking and policy-making.the classification structure represents a standard format to organize detailed information about the state of an economy according to economic principles and perceptions.

The United NAtions standard Products and Services Code(UNSPC)is a global reference taxanomy or classification framework for all products and services for use in eCommerce.It is a four-level hierarchy coded as an eight-digit number,with an optional fifth level adding two more digits.The UNSPC competes with a number of other product and commodity coding schemes,inclusing the European Union's Common Procurement Vocabulary,Germany's eCl@ss,and GS1,s Global Product Classification.
The United Nations Standard Products and Services code is a taxanomy of products and services for use in eCommerce.
HSN is Harmonized system of Nomenclature.It is a multipurpose international product nomenclature developed by the World Customs ORganization(WCO)

HSN  is Harmonized System of Nomenclature.It is a nultipurpose international product nomenclature developed by the World Customs Organization(WCO).It comprises about 5,000  commodity groups;each identifies by a six digit code,arranged in a legal and logical structure and is supported by well-defined rules o achieve uniform classification.The system is used by more than 200 countries and economies as abasis of their Custtoms tariffs and for the collection of international trade statistics.It is also extensively used by governments,international organizations and the private sector for many other purposes such as internal taxes,trade policies,monitoring of controlled goods,rules of origin etc.

SAC(Services and Acoounting Code)codes are based on the Harmonized System of Nomenclature which is an internationally recognized system of classifying and codifying all the products in the world.This system enables the complicance of GST based on the international standards.It will provide a common structure to the government for the proper collaboration of data related to sales and purchase and analyze the same.

Pilog objecive is to have a global repository so that no item requires manual cataloguing.Pilog has developed PRP,A repository/central location in which data is stored and managed.It has embedded industry-standard content and ISO complaint process(Data exchange complaint to ISO 29002).Pilog has spent over twnety years in researching,developing and refining the PRP(Pilog Preferred Records).For those wanting to start with structured descriptions now without waiting for historical data clean up,we offer the Structured Text Generator to built class driven descriptions that improve search capability and eliminate free-text spending.
